Detailed Description

cvmx-shmem provides APIs for setting up shared memory between Linux and simple executive applications.

Revision
41586

Function Documentation

int cvmx_shmem_close ( struct cvmx_shmem_dscptr *  dscptr,
int  remove 
)

Close the share memory,.

Parameters:
remove Remove the named block if it is created by the application

Close the share memory,.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

For Linux user application only.

close a descriptor.

Parameters:
dscptr shared memory descriptor
remove 1: remove the descriptor and named block if this this is the last user of the descriptor 0: do not remove
Returns:
0: Success !0: Failed close a descriptor.
Parameters:
dscptr shared memory descriptor
remove 1: remove the descriptor and named block if this this is the last user of the descriptor 0: do not remove
Returns:
0: Success !0: Failed
